data.name: All-In-One Account - Inv
data.description: The All-In-One Account is a flexible line of credit which can be used for Investment purposes. This account combines a loan and transaction account all into one convenient account at a competitive variable interest rate.

features.additionalInfo: Access your money 24/7 through Internet Banking, Telephone Banking or Mobile Banking services.
Load your Beyond Bank Visa Debit Card to your phone to make fast and easy transactions.

features.additionalValue: Text Me or Push Notification Alert
features.additionalInfo: Available with Internet Banking or via notifications from Mobile Banking. Service enables information about accounts to be sent via SMS to a specified mobile number. It is event triggered or on demand.
New Payments Platform (NPP) available. Allows you to send and receive money instantly between eligible accounts with your PayID.
New Payments Platform (NPP) is available. Use your mobile number or email as your PayID to send and receive money instantly between eligible accounts

constraints.additionalInfo: Maximum loan amount can be up to 90% of the value of the security property.  Subject to lending criteria.

eligibility.additionalValue: Lending criteria, requirements and terms and conditions apply

eligibility.additionalInfo: Available for customers aged 18 years and over
Membership:  You must be or become a Beyond Bank Australia member.
Split Loans Option: You may request to split your loan to combine an All-In-one Account with a Standard Variable Rate Home Loan or a Fixed Rate Home Loan.
Lending criteria, requirements and terms and conditions apply

Must be an Australian citizen, permanent Australian resident or hold a Visa. If a Visa holder's income is relied upon to determine serviceability, the term of the Visa must exceed the term of the loan.

fees.name: Package Conversion Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable on each existing loan when you request to switch between packages.

fees.name: Property Valuation fee
fees.additionalInfo: A property valuation may be required at time of application and we will provide you with a quote if applicable.

fees.name: Mortgage Loan Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable on establishment of the loan.

discounts.description: No Mortgage Loan Establishment Fee - Total Home Loan Package and Life Members

eligibility.additionalInfo: This fee is waived on Total Home Loan Package and Life Membership loans.

fees.name: Mortgage Discharge, Settlement or Partial Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever a mortgage is discharged or partially discharged

fees.name: Loan Variation Documentation fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable when a property already held by us as security is to be used as security for additional credit.

discounts.description: No Loan Variation Documentation fee - Total Home Loan Package and Life Membership

eligibility.additionalInfo: This fee is waived on Total Home Loan Package and Life Membership loans.

fees.name: Default Notice Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable whenever we send you a default notice because you have defaulted under the contract or related mortgage.

fees.name: Mortgage Loan Settlement Fee (a)
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable for a new loan settled.

discounts.description: No Mortgage Loan Settlement Fee (a) - Total Home Loan Package

eligibility.additionalInfo: This fee is waived on Total Home Loan Package.

fees.name: Mortgage Loan Settlement Fee (b)
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable for each loan variation or top up settled.

discounts.description: No Mortgage Loan Settlement Fee (b) - Total Home Loan Package

eligibility.additionalInfo: This fee is waived on Total Home Loan Package.

fees.name: Security Handling Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable if you ask us to prepare documentation to note a change of your name on the title, or produce your land title.

fees.name: Additional Security Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable when we prepare any security in addition to the mortgage over the primary mortgaged property.

fees.name: Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is payable for each search we conduct in relation to a loan or security.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Total Home Loan Package All-In-One Investment loan, LVR <=90% & a minimum loan amount of $50,000.  Conditions apply.
Standard All-in-one Investment Loan, LVR <=90%. Conditions apply.
